Note:
This project is built using Unreal Engine 5 (UE5) and the Gameplay Ability System (GAS). We’re developing almost entirely in C++, with minimal use of Blueprints. Since this is a portfolio presentation and not a tutorial, I wonâ€™t go into detailed explanations of UE5 or GAS concepts.
